examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
    {
			"success: true, 
			"vehicles": [
			 {
			 	_id: "id",
			  	company: "Total",
			    model: "Tesla Model 3",
				speed: 200,
				breakPressed: false,
				clutchPressed: false,
				tempCoolant: 20,
				tempEngine: 60,
				licencePlate: "licence Plate"
			 }
			]
    }
